body:
Excuse me for the name. My friend made me change it. It used to be CaptainAndrew.

Anyways, I actually found Avicus like 2 years ago (maybe 1 1/2) on another account and I played it a lot, but then I kind of got disinterested. After that, I found out about the OCN and I've been on there for 1 1/2 years now, but then I remembered Avicus and I was like "Hey, I should play on here again," so here I am.

I like making PvP maps a lot . So far, I've made 5 maps for the OCN, 2 of which have been added to the repo. I'll probably make maps for Avicus as well. 

Ok I don't know what else to put on here but you guys can AMA.

title: AMA hoenored (CaptainAndrew)

replies.body:
Hello fellow map builder! I have seen some of your builds on OCN and I really like them! I added you on Skype so we can talk about making a map together in the future. If your Skype on your profile isn't your current one. Add me on Skype @ live:rpreatir0520. 

Once again, 
Welcome to Avicus!

replies.body:
I've seen your maps and they're great! It'd be great if you could make some for Avicus :3

Anyways, welcome back!
